name: Team17 Indie Collection
summary:
The Team17 Indie Collection brings together a thrilling assortment of Indie games from some of the most talented developers around in one unmissable bundle!

Included games:

The Escapists - Make your bid for freedon in the smash hit prison escape game

The Escapists: The Walking Dead - Survive the Walking Dead in a brilliant zombie mash up!

Overruled! - A brawler like no other where the players change the rules as they play!

Schrodinger's Cat and the Raiders of the Lost Quark - Puzzle-laden platforming in a unique quantum physics world

Penarium - Avoid an array of killer death-traps in this frantic 2D arena arcade game.

Sheltered - A deep and emotional post-apocalyptic survival game.

Beyond Eyes - Guide a young blind girl on a life changing journey.

LA Cops - A fast, action packed 3D top down shooter set to a theme of 70s Cops.

Not A Hero: Super Snazzy Edition - A funstoppable 2.25D pixelated action opus from Roll7.

OlliOlli 2 XL Edition - The definitive edition of the acclaimed skating game.
